section.heading: Definitions.
section.text: For the purposes of this chapter, the term:

para.text: "Applicant" means any person considered for, who requests to be considered for, or who intends to request to be considered for tenancy within a housing accommodation.
"Arrest" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 32-1341(2).
"Conditional offer" means an offer to rent or lease a rental unit to an applicant that is:
Contingent on the housing provider's subsequent inquiry into the applicant's criminal record; or
Contingent on any other eligibility criteria that the housing provider may utilize.
"Conviction" means a verdict or plea of guilty or nolo contendere.
"Housing accommodation" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 42-3501.03(14).
"Housing provider" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 42-3501.03(15).
"Inquiry" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 32-1341(8).
"Pending criminal accusation" shall mean "criminal accusation" as that term is defined in § 32-1341(5).
"Rental unit" shall have the same meaning as provided in § 42-3501.03(33).
